name: SocialGrow
tag_list: social-network, social-networking, linkedin, twitter, facebook, connections, commonangels, web-app, web-application
overview:
SocialGrowâ„¢ Inc. offers the easiest way to connect with the people you know to grow your social networks. Our application automates the process of sending invitations to friend/follow/connect on usersâ€™ choice of social networks & helps marketers increase the reach and impact of their brands online.

SocialGrow also enables social networks to grow their paid subscribers and free members.

Our application works on Windows, Mac, and Linux; and with Outlook, Gmail, and other email applications.

SocialGrowâ„¢ is a member of the Microsoft BizSparkâ„¢ Startup program and sponsored by CommonAngelsâ„¢ of Lexington, MA.

SocialGrowâ„¢ was one of 5 startups chosen internationally to participate in the Microsoft Windows 7 Incubation Week, was named one of MassHighTech Five Startups to Watch, was named Microsoft Startup of the Day worldwide, and was named Five Boston Startups Killing It On Twitter by BostInnovation.

milestones.description: Completion of MicrosoftÂ® Windows 7 BizSparkâ„¢ Incubation Week.
milestones.source_description: Microsoft ISV and BizSpark Startup Evangelism

milestones.description: Wiggio (http://www.wiggio.com), creators of popular web-based group collaboration software, today announced their selection of software, consulting, and professional services company SocialGrow (http://www.socialgrow.com), as the beta commercial customer
milestones.source_description: Wiggio Selects SocialGrow as Beta Commercial Customer for Their Group Collaboration Software

milestones.description: SocialGrow named by MassHighTech magazine as one of "five startups you should follow"
milestones.source_description: MassHighTech: The Journal of New England Technology

milestones.description: SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #15 of 52 CMOs to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
SocialGrow Announces User Registration for Alpha Release of its New Software
SocialGrow named Microsoft BizSpark Most Promising Startup of the Day worldwide
SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #9 of 60 CMOs to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
SocialGrow President Marsh Sutherland and CMO Ken Herron appointed Microsoft Solutions Advocates.
@socialgrow Twitter following reaches 10,000 followers on 01/01/10
SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #8 of 63 CMOs worldwide to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #7 of 66 CMOs worldwide to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
SocialGrow incorporated as a Delaware C corporation by [Gunderson Dettmer](http://www.crunchbase.com/service-provider/gunderson-dettmer)
SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #3 of 70 CMOs worldwide to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
SocialGrowâ„¢ Launches Alpha Release of its New Social Networking Software
SocialGrowâ„¢ named one of 5 Boston Startups Who Are Killing it on Twitter
SocialGrow CMO Ken Herron named #2 of 73 CMOs worldwide to follow on Twitter by Systemic Marketing
Ken was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in June 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
SocialGrow gains 25,000 followers on Twitter.
SocialGrow celebrates first anniversary.
Microsoft names SocialGrow a Tier 1 Network Partner.
Ken was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in July 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in August 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in September 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in October 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in November 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in December 2010 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Marsh Sutherland accepted onto the Microsoft Partner Research Panel.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in January 2011 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in February 2011 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in March 2011 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
Ken Herron was ranked the #2 CMO on Twitter worldwide in April 2011 by Social Media Marketing Magazine.
